product_name: Redwood Hikes Bay Area Topographic Trail Map - Carquinez Strait and Berkeley Hills
long_description: The Redwood Hikes Bay Area topographic trail map covers the myriad of trails and topography of Carquinez Strait and Berkeley Hills in vivid, easy-to-read detail. One side of the full-color map displays Tilden, Wildcat Canyon and Briones regional parks, along with San Pablo and Briones reservoirs. The other side shows the Carquinez Strait area, including Crockett Hills and Carquinez Strait regional parks, Muir Heritage Land Trust and the northern EBMUD watershed. Map is printed on waterproof, tear-resistant material with a plastic coating that offers the durability needed for outdoor use. The Redwood Hikes Bay Area topographic trail map measures 9.2 x 4.3 in. folded and 39 x 27 in. fully opened; scale of 1:25,000. Redwood Hikes Press; copyright 2013.
short_description: The Redwood Hikes Bay Area topographic trail map covers the myriad of trails and topography of Carquinez Strait and Berkeley Hills in vivid, easy-to-read detail.
